record.id: field.name="generatedcats" and file.name="kmdocument" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: generatedcats
record.file.name: kmdocument

brief.brief: A system-generated list of the names of the knowledge category(s) that contain this document.
Whenever the document is edited, Knowledge Management generates this list from the categories field.
Because category names may change, the names in the generatedcats field are constructed from the non-changing ids in the categories field.
Note: The categories are associated with search and view access. When a document is approved, Knowledge Management granges access by category, knowledge group, and knowledge profile.
